articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the technologically updated Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory as required by the IT age.
					 After being briefed on the factory in front of a huge map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il looked round various places including the confectionary production process put on a CNC basis with indigenous technology and home-made equipment and the products exhibition to acquaint himself in detail with its updating and technical equipment and production there.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the builders and their helpers, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the factory automated all the production processes ranging from the feeding of raw materials to the packing of products by putting them on a CNC basis and thus dramatically increased the production and established a high level of cultured practice in hygiene and production. 
					
					 It is a miracle that the technological updating of the factory was successfully completed in a matter of several months, he said, adding that this stirring reality eloquently proves that officials can bring about an epochal change in improving the standard of people's diet in a short span of time when they keep hold on science and technology with ardent love for the people and devoted service for them. 
					
					 He extended thanks to relevant enterprises and teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology and other universities and institutes which made positive contributions to the technological updating of the factory.
					
					 Noting that the factory has an important role to play in improving the standard of the citizens' diet, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 He underscored the need to continue dynamically pushing forward the modernization and scientization of production processes on the basis of the achievements already made by the factory. 
					
					 An important task to be carried out by the factory is to steadily boost the production of foodstuff including confectionary and, at the same time, improve their quality, he noted, stressing that in order to supply tasty and attractive sweets and biscuit to people it is necessary to intensify the research into this field and successfully settle the problems of spices and coloring matters while improving designs for goods. 
					
					 He pointed out that in order to keep production going at a high rate it is necessary to take thorough measures for the supply of raw materials, specifying the orientation and ways to do so. He showed such great care as settling the issues raised. 
					
					 He earnestly called on the officials, workers, and technicians of the factory to satisfactorily perform their honorable mission and duty to provide the best people with a more plentiful life at an early date as they have worked hard, steadfastly covering the road of the arduous revolution  with single-minded fidelity to the Party. 
					
					  He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Secretary Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Il from Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Il from Hu Jintao
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Tuesday received a message of sympathy from Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China.
					 The message said:
					
					 Upon hearing the sad news that some parts of your country were hit by severe flood recently, causing causalities and property losses, I express deep sympathy and consolation to you and, through you, to the government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 We believe that the people in the afflicted area of your country will surely recover from natural disaster and bring their living to normal as early as possible under the dynamic leadership of you Comrade General Secretary and the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Chinese Govt Decides to Provide Relief Materials to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Govt Decides to Provide Relief Materials to DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Chinese government decided to provide emergency relief materials to the DPRK in connection with the fact that some areas of the DPRK including Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province, were hit by flood recently.
					 This measure will encourage the Korean people in their efforts to recover from the flood damage as early as possible and more energetically step up the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Jimmy Carter Here
articles.content:
Jimmy Carter Here
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Jimmy Carter, ex-president of the U.S., and his party arrived here Wednesday.
					 They were greeted at the airport by Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Jimmy Carter
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Jimmy Carter
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a cordial talk with Jimmy Carter, ex-president of the U.S., and his party Wednesday when they paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 Present there were Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam arranged a reception in honor of Jimmy Carter and his party at the Paekhwawon State Guesthouse on the same day.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Marks Start of Songun Leadership
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Marks Start of Songun Leadership
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A grand music and dance performance "Long March for Victory of Songun" was given at the April 25 House of Culture Wednesday to celebrate the golden jubilee of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Among the audience were senior state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party and armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					In such numbers as grand mixed chorus "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung", group dance and mixed chorus "Let's Defend the Party with Our Lives" and mixed chorus "Our General is the Best", the performers sang high praises of the undying five-decade long history of Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche started by President
						 Kim Il Sung, thus protecting the destiny of the country and the nation and ushering in a new era of prosperity on this land.
					
					 Also put on the stage were colorful numbers depicting servicepersons performing feats as guardians of the destiny of the country and creators of people's happiness and the proud appearance of the country blessed with Songun under the care of the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Performances Given across Country
articles.content:
Performances Given across Country
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership was significantly celebrated across the country.
					 Performances were given in Pyongyang and localities.
					
					 Given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater was a performance given by artistes of central art organizations including those of the Mansudae Art Troupe and the State Folk Art Troupe.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as prologue "Half a Century-long Journey of Songun", female solo and chorus "My Country of Songun," male solo and female pangchang "Tell, Road of Songun" and female instrumental ensemble "We Long for You, General".
					
					 The State Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the Moranbong Theatre while the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall.
					
					 Revolutionary opera "A True Daughter of the Party" was staged at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre while a performance of artistes of the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 The artistes of the Pyongyang Circus pleased the audience with peculiar acrobatic numbers.
					
					 Multifarious functions such as a music and dance performance, an oratorical meeting and dancing party were held in various parts of the country, adding to the festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held across the country Wednesday to celebrate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The April 25 House of Culture plaza here was crowded with youth and students who gathered there to celebrate the significant day.
					
					 Narration "May Long Journey of Songun Shine" was presented and then began the dancing party to the tune of song "Our General Is the Best." 
					
					 The participants presented dances to the tune of such songs as "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and "Appearing in the East and in the West, It's the Anti-Japanese Guerilla Style." The dancing party that turned the vast plaza into a veritable sea of dancers represented thanks to Kim Jong Il who has made journeys of patriotic devotion for the last five decades, instilling the invincible spirit into the army and people of the DPRK, demonstrating the national power of Juche Korea and making a new history of building a thriving nation.
					
					 They also reflected the pride and happiness of bringing about great innovations and leaping progress in building a rich and powerful country under the wise guidance of the illustrious Songun commander.
					
					 Similar events took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Film Show Held at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Film Show Held at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition and a film show were held at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Aug. 23 to mark the golden jubilee of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos on the theme of "Leader Kim Jong Il and Songun Politics" and other photos on his visit to China. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, Hu Zhengyue, assistant to foreign minister of China, a vice-director for Personnel Affairs of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned. 
					
					 Ambassador Choe Pyong Gwan and staff members of the DPRK embassy were present.
					
					 Participants looked round the photos on display before watching Korean feature film "The Country I Saw" (Part 2).
					
					 The deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee stressed that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has led socialist construction in the DPRK while assisting President Kim Il Sung from long ago, thus performing undying feats and making great contributions to boosting the China-DPRK friendship. Kim Jong Il's visit to China in May last put the friendly relations between the two parties and the two countries on a new higher stage, he noted. 
					
					 He said that the Chinese people are rejoiced over fresh achievements being made by the Korean people in various fields such as development of the economy and improvement of the standard of people's living. He stressed that the two sides would positively implement the common recognition made by the leaders of the two countries so as to further strengthen the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries.

articles.title: DPRK's Might Strengthened under Songun Leadership
articles.content:
DPRK's Might Strengthened under Songun Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il has placed the political and military might of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on the highest peak with his outstanding Songun leadership. With the result, the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as an invincible socialist power and pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation.
					 Over the past five decades since he inspected a Korean People's Army unit on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) to start his Songun revolutionary leadership, he has always directed primary attention to strengthening the political and military power of the country and wisely guided the effort for this purpose.
					
					 He has achieved the sameness of ideology in the Workers' Party of Korea, army and revolutionary ranks and accelerated the revolution and construction with the army as the pillar and main force of the country. He has also boosted the nation's defense capabilities in line with the principle of self-defense. 
					
					 Attaching great importance to the position and role of the army, he has given top priority to increasing the military strength of the country.
					
					 Under his leadership, the army has grown to be an invincible one serving the leader and the Party devotedly and a powerful force for the cause of Juche and the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Defense industry has developed into a modern and independent one so that the entire army could be modernized and an all-people, nationwide defense system established in the country.
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime are zealously seeking a preemptive strike at the DPRK. But the DPRK is an impregnable fortress with its political and military power ever growing under the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Leadership
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Songun Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls upon all the people to hold higher the red flag of the Songun revolution closely rallied around General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il and wage a dynamic struggle for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					 His first field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) marked a historical event that declared the Korean revolution, which started and advanced with arms, has greeted a new era for the successful accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche along the path of Songun, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's history of the Songun revolutionary leadership is glorious annals in which he has developed the People's Army into a pillar and a main force for the revolution and ushered in a new era of the Juche cause emerging ever-victorious in reliance upon the powerful military power and a sacred course in which he has significantly bolstered the war deterrent of the country, reliably protecting the destiny and future of all the generations to come.
					
					 The headquarters of the revolution, single-minded unity and socialism form a community linked by the same destiny and the powerful military capacity provides a sure guarantee for the sovereignty of the nation in the DPRK where Kim Jong Il's Songun politics is in force.
					
					 Songun represents independence, truth and victory.
					
					 The DPRK remains unfazed by any high-handed practices and pressure, ceaseless moves for aggression, sanctions and blockade on the part of the imperialist reactionaries and those who encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK can never escape unpredictable strikes.
					
					 World-startling spectacular events are taking place one after another in the DPRK which is dashing ahead, giving full play to the inexhaustible strength built up in the tempests of the Songun revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, the auspicious events of the mass-production of Juche iron, Juche vinalon and Juche fertilizers, the development of the CNC technology pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and the completion of the Taegyedo Tideland Reclamation project and many other astonishing miracles and innovations took place one after another. All these have instilled confidence and optimism about the rosy future of evermore prospering country into the people.
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for Songun Korea as long as there are the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the single-minded unity of the servicepersons and the people rallied close around the headquarters of the revolution and the tremendous might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of political officials of the Vietnam People's Army headed by Lieut. General Ngo Xuan Lich, deputy head of the General Political Department, and a delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Lieut. General Zhang Youxia, commander of the area, arrived here Wednesday. 
					 On the same day, the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army gave a reception in honor of the delegation of political officials of the Vietnam People's Army and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces a reception in honor of the delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

articles.title: National Memorial Service for Kim Hyok Hel
articles.content:
National Memorial Service for Kim Hyok Held
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service for revolutionary fighter Kim Hyok was held at the Central Youth Hall Wednesday to commemorate the 80th anniversary of his death.
					 Attending the service were Kim Yong Nam and other senior party, army and state officials, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media organs and working people in the city.
					
					 Kim Hyok was a revolutionary of the proud first generation of the Korean revolution who played the role of a pace-setter in opening up a new history of unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks centering on the leader and a revolutionary poet who created and disseminated revolutionary song "Star of Korea."
					
					 Born into a peasant's family in North Phyongan Province, he roamed about inside and outside Korea, looking for a leader who would lead him along the patriotic path of anti-Japanese struggle. It was not until he met President Kim Il Sung in Jilin in the summer of Juche 16 (1927) that he embarked upon the road of genuine revolution. He, as a core member of the young communist league and a member of the first party organization, worked as chief editor of "Bolshevik," a revolutionary publication, and a commanding officer of the Korean Revolutionary Army.
					
					 He had bravely fought, always full of ardent passion, under the leadership of Kim Il Sung until he died a heroic death on August 25, 1930 at the age of 23.
					
					 The President made sure that his bust was erected at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, youth shock brigades were named after him and a slogan calling for learning after him was put up so as to make his revolutionary feats go down in history.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate Politburo member and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in his memorial address said that short as his life was, Kim Hyok lived a noble life of a genuine revolutionary fighter who taught how a revolutionary should uphold his leader and live and fight for the country and the revolution.
					
					 Though much water has flown under the bridge since he passed away, he is leading an eternal life, enjoying highest glory under the care of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the speaker said, calling upon all the party members, servicepersons and other people to invariably and firmly defend and carry forward the precious ideological and moral treasures left behind by the revolutionary forerunners and give steady continuity to the Juche tradition of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Hyok
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Hyok
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the bust of revolutionary martyr Kim Hyok at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Wednesday on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of his death.
					 Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and others.
					
					 Placed were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the WPK, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Culture, the C.C. of the Writers Union of Korea, the Kumsong Youth Publishing House and party and power organs in the city and the city committee of the youth league.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Hyok.

articles.title: DPRK Contributes to Development of NAM
articles.content:
DPRK Contributes to Development of NAM
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Since the Democratic People's Republic of Korea joined the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) on August 25, Juche 64 (1975), its government has played an active role to develop the anti-imperialist revolutionary movement aspiring after independence.
					 The birth of the NAM marked a crucial occasion in strengthening the revolutionary forces of the world. With it playing an important part in the international arena, the imperialists have found obstacles in having their own way.
					
					 Upset by the NAM becoming a powerful force advancing the history of humankind along the road of independence, the imperialists have pursued "globalization", trying to sow discord among its members and press them to accept Western-style democracy, multi-party system and polycentrism. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, with a deep understanding of the situation, published such famous works as "The Non-Aligned Movement Is A Mighty Anti-Imperialist Revolutionary Forces of Our Times" and "For the Development of the Non-Aligned Movement" to clarify the principles and tasks for promoting the unity of the NAM and invigorating the effort for global independence.
					
					 The DPRK government, on the instructions of the President, strived hard to frustrate the imperialists' moves for alienation and maintain the unity of the NAM in the international arena, including its summits and conferences of foreign ministers.
					
					The DPRK, in line with the ideas of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and under his leadership, is still making a great contribution to preventing the split-up of the movement and advancing it in accordance with its noble mission and goal.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Symposium Hea ld
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Symposium Held
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological symposium in the field of natural environmental protection was held at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday.
					 Present there were officials, scientists and technicians in the field.
					
					 The symposium heard 21 papers, which suggest new ideas and are applicable to production, among more than 150 subjects studied by officials, scientists and technicians in the above-said field. 
					
					 They solved scientific and technological problems arising in protecting water, atmosphere, soil and ecological environment, preventing pollution and making an effective re-use of various industrial waste in recent years.
					
					 Appreciated by the participants were successes made in the researches into the subjects of great practical significance in improving the working and living conditions of working people and stepping up economic construction. 
					
					 Also introduced at the symposium were papers dealing with the forest conservation and experience gained in introducing IT to researches into the environmental protection.

articles.title: National Martial Arts Championships Opens
articles.content:
National Martial Arts Championships Opens
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The 5th National Martial Arts Championships for September 10 Prize was opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-do Hall on Wednesday.
					 The championships brought together at least 700 male and female players from 14 units including the Pyongyang City and provincial Taekwon-do teams. 
					
					 They will compete in Taekwon-do, go and Korean wrestling events.
					
					 Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-do Committee, made an opening address.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms UFG Test Nuclear War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms UFG Test Nuclear War
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are advertising the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises as ones for "examining defense and counter-action posture of the U.S.-south Korea Combined Forces" and a "drill of command post", not one for field maneuverability.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is quite nonsensical to term UFG as one for "defense." The means involved in it, its scale, contents and nature prove that the military exercises are all-out war exercises targeted against the DPRK to all intents and purposes and the largest-ever test nuclear war.
					
					 After taking office the Obama Administration let loose rhetoric to create the impression that it is "interested" in the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula while talking about "a world without nuclear weapons". But the reality goes to patently prove that its much touted plan for building "a world without nuclear weapons" and "denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula" are nothing but hypocrisy.
					
					 Through UFG the U.S. imperialists seek to pressurize and threaten the DPRK by force of arms. It is by no means fortuitous that they advertised the war maneuvers as a "demonstration of armed forces".
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK remain unfazed by such bluffing of the warmongers. It is the independent right of a sovereign state to defend oneself.
					
					 The warmongers at home and abroad had better stop at once their reckless war racket, not misjudging the mental power and strength of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Holding aloft Banner of NAM Called for
articles.content:
Holding aloft Banner of NAM Called for
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The government and people of the DPRK will as ever boost the solidarity and cooperation with the peoples of the non-aligned countries, creditably perform their duty as a member state of the Non-Aligned Movement and make every possible effort to strengthen the movement.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in a signed article Wednesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 After becoming a full-fledged member state of the Non-Aligned Movement on Aug. 25, 1975, the DPRK has held its position in the ranks of the movement. This was a brilliant fruition of the foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for independence and peace which embodied the immortal Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung and a striking demonstration of its validity and tremendous vitality.
					
					 The DPRK's accession to the NAM helped it further raise its position and role in the struggle for peace, independence and sovereignty against imperialism and colonialism and made it possible for its people to win many more friends in the international arena as a result of which a more favorable international atmosphere was created for the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The NAM has grown to be a wide-ranging international movement grouping 118 countries at present and it serves as a powerful driving force of advancing the history of humankind.
					
					 Today the imperialists' policy of aggression and war is rendering the overall international situation more complicated and tense.
					
					 Independence and peace have been most wantonly violated in the international relations.
					
					 Independence is what keeps each country and nation alive, and it is a main principle of the Non-Aligned Movement to preserve independence.
					
					 The reality proves that if the non-aligned countries make joint efforts to consolidate the unity and cohesion of the movement, prompted by their stand to realize common purposes, they can successfully frustrate the imperialists' wicked moves to split and sow discord among them.
					
					 No force on earth can block the advance of the non-aligned countries advancing under the uplifted banner of the NAM.

articles.title: Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Called for
articles.content:
Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Called for
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on August 22 on the lapse of a centenary since the fabrication of the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					 The statement recalled that a centenary ago, "Resident-General" of Korea Terauchi and traitor Ri Wan Yong fabricated the treaty without getting any signature of Emperor Sunjong, thus reducing Korea to a colony of Japanese imperialism. 
					
					 Saying that the Lee Myung Bak regime is little short of the traitors in the past who sold off the country, the statement accused the authorities of extending the "transfer of wartime operation control", frantically staging in league with the U.S. and Japan the exercises for a nuclear war aimed at exterminating the nation and selling off even the economic arteries to foreign forces without positively reacting to the moves of Japan to grab Tok Islets.
					
					 It held that as long as the Lee Myung Bak regime is allowed to stay in power, Korea will be occupied by foreign forces again as it happened a century ago and its people will not escape the fate of a stateless nation. 
					
					 The statement called on all the people to turn out in the actions for severely punishing the Lee regime who have sold off the national sovereignty to foreign forces, not forgetting the lesson taught by history.

articles.title: S. Korea Puts Han Sang Ryol in Custody
articles.content:
S. Korea Puts Han Sang Ryol in Custody
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The fascist clique of south Korea finally put Rev. Han Sang Ryol, reunification champion, in custody on August 23 on charges of violation of the "National Security Law", according to south Korean KBS.
					 That day the puppet Seoul District Court issued a warrant for arrest of him under the unreasonable pretext of "concern over destruction of evidence and flight".

articles.title: Han Sang Ryol's Unconditional Release Demanded
articles.content:
Han Sang Ryol's Unconditional Release Demanded
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on August 21 calling for the unconditional release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol.
					 The statement referred to the fact that Rev. Han, reunification champion who visited the north on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, was taken away by the puppet National Intelligence Service and the police of south Korea as soon as he went back via Panmunjom.
					
					 The reverend's action that visited the north at the risk of his life to achieve the national reunification and implement the June 15 joint declaration should be estimated as a patriotic decision, the statement noted.
					
					 Denouncing the Lee Myung Bak "government" for its unreasonable suppression of Rev. Han, it warned that if the "government" resorts to crackdown upon pro-reunification figures and reunification movement organizations again, refusing to set him free, it would meet the judgment of the history.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Saber-Rattling Condemned
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Saber-Rattling Condemned
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- British political parties and organizations held a rally and demonstration outside the U.S. and south Korean embassies in London on Aug. 17 in protest against the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities. 
					 Present there were figures of political parities and organizations including the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and popular masses.
					
					 A statement issued by the British branch denouncing provocative UFG was read out and speeches were made at the rally. 
					
					 Speakers branded the said saber-rattling as the anti-DPRK war exercises for aggression, contending the presence of the U.S. troops in south Korea is contrary to the resolution of the 30th Session of the UN General Assembly and the Korean Armistice Agreement.
					
					 Praising the socialist system of the DPRK as the most advantageous one in the world, they called for fully supporting and protecting the DPRK. 
					
					They staged a demonstration, shouting slogans "Stop the war exercises!", "Down with the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime!" and "U.S. forces, quit south Korea!" with placards reading "U.S. imperialists, take hands off Korea" and "We oppose UN sanctions" and flags of the DPRK in their hands.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, round-table talks, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Romania, Pakistan, Iran, Peru and the Czech Republic between August 14 and 18 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos showing the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The president of the Romanian Socialist Union said at a meeting that the DPRK has firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country in the stand-off with the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower" thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve the country's reunification under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said in a report made at the seminar that the capability for self-defence in the DPRK has grown stronger than ever before and shining miracles unprecedented in its history are taking place on all fronts of socialist construction under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Reply of Korea" and "Night of Pyongyang".
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by the Sachwa Publishing House of Kuwait to mark the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The work, published on Aug. 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification, formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification based on them.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- One August day in Juche 56 (1967), General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il had his car stopped near the dam of the Jangjingang Power Plant during his inspection tour of rural communities in Yonggwang County, South Hamgyong Province.
					Some workers rushed toward him. After receiving their bows, Kim Jong Il told them that the dam should always be kept in good condition as it was not only a valuable property of the county for power production but also an asset to be handed down to coming generations.
					
					Lunchtime passed all too soon.
					
					An official told him that it was time to leave.
					
					Kim Jong Il, however, said that if they had left suddenly while having an interesting conversation, the workers would feel very sorry. He then suggested having lunch together with the workers, though he was very busy with field guidance.

articles.title: En Pyongyang Jimmy Carter
articles.content:
En Pyongyang Jimmy Carter
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El ex presidente norteamericano Jimmy Carter y su comitiva llegaron el dia 25 a esta capital.
					En la terminal aerea los acogio el vicecanciller coreano Kim Kye Gwan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Carter
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Carter
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sostuvo este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae cordiales conversaciones con el ex presidente de Estados Unidos, Jimmy Carter, y su comitiva, que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller coreano Kim Kye Gwan y otros funcionarios.
					
					 Este dia, Kim ofrecio un banquete en honor de los visitantes en la Casa de Huespedes del Estado Paekhwawon.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion "Marcha larga por el triunfo del Songun"
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion "Marcha larga por el triunfo del Songun"
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- Se ofrecio el dia 25 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la gran funcion de musica y danza "Marcha larga por el triunfo del Songun", dedicada al 50o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					Presenciaron el espectaculo los cuadros del Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron invitados los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					En las piezas como el gran coro mixto "Himno al Mariscal Kim Il Sung", la danza en grupo y coro mixto "Defendamos a riesgo de la vida el Comite Central del Partido", el coro mixto "Nuestro General es el mejor", etc., los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico los 50 anos sagrados e imborrables en que el Dirigente defendio el destino de la patria y la nacion y abrio sobre este territorio la nueva era de prosperidad continuando exitosamente la autoctona causa revolucionaria del Songun iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					En la escena se presentaron otras diversas piezas que describen a los oficiales y soldados del EPC, que acumulan muchos meritos como defensores del destino de la patria y creadores de la felicidad del pueblo en el regazo del Comandante Insigne del Paektu, y el orgulloso aspecto de nuestro pais donde el pueblo se beneficia del Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a seguir la direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a seguir la direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de este miercoles un editorial exhortando a todos a unirse compactamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche con la bandera roja de la revolucion del Songun en alto. 
					El 25 de agosto del 49(1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente dio su primer paso de orientacion a la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del Ejercito Popular de Corea. Esta visita fue un evento historico que declaro que la revolucion coreana iniciada y avanzada por las fuerzas armadas entro en la nueva era para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche por la orbita del Songun, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					La trayectoria de guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun deviene los anales gloriosos y sagrados en que el fortalecio el EPC como pilar y grueso de la revolucion, allano la nueva era de la causa del Juche que sale siempre victoriosa a base del invencible poderio militar y defendio con firmeza el destino y el futuro de la nacion consolidando por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra del pais. 
					
					En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea donde se materializa la politica de Songun del Dirigente, la Direccion de la Revolucion, la unidad monolitica y el socialismo forman una comunidad de destino, y la potente capacidad militar asegura con firmeza la soberania nacional. 
					
					El Songun es precisamente la independencia, la verdad y la victoria. 
					
					No vacilamos ante el despotismo y la presion de toda indole, las constantes maniobras agresivas, las sanciones y bloqueos de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios. Los que se atreven a atacar la soberania de nuestro pais no podran evitar el golpe inimaginable.
					
					La RPDC, que avanza a pasos firmes siguiendo al Dirigente y poniendo de pleno manifiesto su inagotable fuerza acumulada en la tempestad de la revolucion del Songun, crea unos tras otros eventos especiales que admiran a todo el mundo: el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong no.2", el gran jubilo de la produccion en avalanchas del hierro Juche, del vinalon Juche y del abono Juche, la conquista de la cumbre de tecnologia CNC, la roturacion de las marismas Taegyedo, etc.
					
					Al experimentar tales milagros y cambios que se logran escalonadamente, los coreanos estan llenos de la confianza y el optimismo en el radiante futuro de la patria prospera.
					
					La Corea del Songun saldra siempre victoriosa y gloriosa gracias a la direccion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, a la unidad monolitica de todos los militares y civiles en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion y al inagotable poderio del invencible ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Acto central por 80o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Hyok
articles.content:
Acto central por 80o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kim Hyok
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 80o aniversario del fallecimiento del combatiente revolucionario Kim Hyok.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Kim Hyok fue uno de los integrantes de la primera generacion orgullosa de la revolucion coreana, que cumplio el papel de vanguardia en dar inicio a la nueva historia de la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias cuyo centro es el lider, y el poeta revolucionario que creo y divulgo el himno revolucionario "Lucero de Corea".
					
					Nacido en una familia campesina de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, el divagaba por el interior del pais y el extranjero en busca de un lider que lo condujera a la patriotica lucha antijaponesa.
					
					En verano del 16 (1927) de la Era Juche, se reunio en Jilin por primera vez con el Presidente           Kim Il Sung.
					
					Desde entonces, pudo emprender el verdadero camino de la revolucion y siendo miembro medular de la Union de la Juventud Comunista y de la primera organizacion del partido, trabajo de editor de la publicacion revolucionaria "Bolchevique" y miembro directivo del Ejercito Revolucionario de Corea. 
					
					El siempre luchaba valientemente con gran entusiasmo bajo la guia del Presidente y cayo heroicamente el 25 de agosto de 1930 a los 23 anos de edad. 
					
					Para transmitir eternamente en la historia sus proezas revolucionarias, el Presidente hizo colocar su busto en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y denominar con su nombre las brigadas juveniles de trabajo y presento las consignas llamando a seguir su ejemplo.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra de recordacion, el miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, dijo que aunque fue demasiado corta la vida de Kim Hyok, esta fue la noble vida del verdadero combatiente revolucionario que mostro como debe apoyar a su lider, vivir y luchar por la patria y la revolucion. 
					
					Ya paso mucho tiempo desde su fallecimiento, el vive eternamente en el regazo del gran lider y del gran dirigente y en la cima de glorias, asevero.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben defender invariable y firmemente las valiosas riquezas ideologicas y espirituales logradas por los martires revolucionarios y heredarlas para dar continuidad al linaje del Juche de la revolucion coreana, concluyo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- Ahora los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos insisten en que el simulacro militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" es para "revisar la disposicion de defensa y reaccion" de las "fuerzas aliadas" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y no se trata de ejercicio movil sino un "entrenamiento de los puestos de mando".
					 En un comentario individual del dia 25, el periodico Rodong Sinmun afirmo que distan mucho de ser "defensivos" los ejercicios "Ulji Freedom Guardian" porque se movilizan en ellos demasiados medios y fuerzas de ataque.
					
					 Si se toma en cuenta la dimension, el contenido y el caracter de "Ulji Freedom Guardian", esta maniobra es de punta a cabo el ensayo de guerra total y nuclear de mayor dimension en la historia para agredir a la RPDC, senala asi el comentarista y continua:
					
					 Despues de su aparicion, la administracion Obama hablo mucho del "mundo sin armas nucleares" y fingio como si estuviera "interesado" en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					  Pero, la situacion actual demuestra fehacientemente que no pasan de ser una hipocresia el proyecto de construccion del "mundo sin armas nucleares" y la "desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana", de que hablan tanto los gobernantes norteamericanos.
					
					  Los imperialistas yanquis tratan de presionar y amedrentar militarmente a la RPDC librando "Ulji Freedom Guardian" a modo de "manifestacion de las fuerzas armadas".
					
					  Pero, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no quedaran sorprendidos jamas ante tal fanfarroneria de los belicistas.
					
					  Un Estado soberano tiene el derecho independiente a la autodefensa.
					
					  Los belicistas internos y externos deben suspender de inmediato sus inutiles ejercicios belicos sin equivocar el poderio espiritual y fisico del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
